BIO

I have been learning Front-end web development for a bit more then a half year. Besides gaining solid JavaScript fundamentals, both in vanilla JS and ES6 by developping several projects, I can state that I could implement my own idea into one of them utilizing the materials learnt (currency exchange feature). I got familiarized with modular development (MVC) as well as the basics of NPM - Webpack, Babel tools. To be able to build fancy responsive layouts I also took some lessons to acquire CSS grids.
